files.README.md:
# yantyx-skills

The skills that I use myself.

## Installation

```bash
claude plugin marketplace add yantyx/skills

claude plugin install mercurial-hg@yantyx-skills
claude plugin install fix-chinese-garbled@yantyx-skills
```

## Skills

### mercurial-hg

Comprehensive Mercurial (Hg) version control system guide covering:

- Repository initialization and cloning
- Basic operations (status, add, commit, pull, push)
- Branch management and merging
- Advanced operations (rebase, histedit, graft)
- Team collaboration workflows
- Patch queue (MQ) operations
- Configuration and extensions
- Troubleshooting common issues

### fix-chinese-garbled

Automatically detects and fixes garbled Chinese characters in text:

- Identifies common encoding issues (e.g., UTF-8, GBK, Big5)
- Converts garbled text back to readable Chinese
- Supports multiple encoding formats
- Easy integration into text processing workflows

## License

MIT License
